        private java.util.ArrayList<CommercialProperty> searchResultCommercial
        searchResult is an ArrayList of items created from the Broker. It is used to hold items that have been searched based on a search criteria (such as Id, address, etc.)

      • maxTextFieldLength

        private boolean maxTextFieldLength(int maxLength,
                                   java.lang.String field)
        maxTextFieldLength is used to validate the max character length in textfields.
        Parameters:
        maxLength - is an int that indicates the allowed character length for the textfield.
        field - is a String that represents what textfield is being tested.
        Returns:
        a boolean. ture means it is valid and fits within maxLength. false means it is not valid and goes over maxLength.

      • checkFieldsEmpty

        private boolean checkFieldsEmpty()
        checkFieldsEmpty will validate that every field has information entered before it can be saved.
        Returns:
        a boolean if all is filled =true, any empty = false
